targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0 + 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
targets.refId: from(bucket: "vault_infra")   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)   |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.refId: from(bucket: "vault_infra")   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")   |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)   |> yield(name: "mean")

matcher.options: used_percent {datacenter="us-east-1", device="devtmpfs", fstype="devtmpfs", host="haproxy", mode="rw", path="/dev", role="haproxy"}
used_percent {datacenter="us-east-1", device="tmpfs", fstype="tmpfs", host="haproxy", mode="rw", path="/dev/shm", role="haproxy"}
used_percent {datacenter="us-east-1", device="tmpfs", fstype="tmpfs", host="haproxy", mode="rw", path="/run", role="haproxy"}
used_percent {datacenter="us-east-1", device="tmpfs", fstype="tmpfs", host="haproxy", mode="rw", path="/run/user/1000", role="haproxy"}
used_percent {datacenter="us-east-1", device="xvda2", fstype="xfs", host="haproxy", mode="rw", path="/", role="haproxy"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: For the backend this reports the number queued without a server assigned.

matcher.options: qcur {datacenter="us-east-1", host="haproxy", proxy="vault", role="haproxy", server="127.0.0.1:9000", sv="BACKEND", type="backend"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "qcur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "BACKEND")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Current queued requests

matcher.options: http_response.4xx {datacenter="us-east-1", host="haproxy", proxy="main", role="haproxy", server="127.0.0.1:9000", sv="FRONTEND", type="frontend"}
http_response.5xx {datacenter="us-east-1", host="haproxy", proxy="main", role="haproxy", server="127.0.0.1:9000", sv="FRONTEND", type="frontend"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "http_response.4xx" or r["_field"] == "http_response.5xx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

matcher.options: req_rate {datacenter="us-east-1", host="haproxy", proxy="main", role="haproxy", server="127.0.0.1:9000", sv="FRONTEND", type="frontend"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "req_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

matcher.options: rate {datacenter="us-east-1", host="haproxy", proxy="main", role="haproxy", server="127.0.0.1:9000", sv="FRONTEND", type="frontend"}

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main" or r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
